items.name: Melon Juice
items.description: Melon Juice or Cantaloupe Juice is a simple and refreshing drink that you can prepare not only during summer time, but the whole year round as long as you have access to cantaloupe.

items.name: Strawberry Greek Smoothie
items.description: You can tell that I’m telling the truth because I chose to enjoy smoothies over hot cocoa or tea while it is not officially spring yet here in Chicagoland.

items.name: Blueberry Greek Smoothie
items.description: I enjoy having blueberry smoothie for breakfast when I feel that I don’t need caffeine.

items.name: Cranberry Apple Juice
items.description: Cranberry juice is perfect for thanksgiving especially if you have some fresh cranberries around.
